segments.text: I just caught a glimpse of our pilot and he looks exactly like Sully. I think it is Sully.
I think that's a woman.
Oh, I know what you're doing. You're testing the limits of my feminism.
I will have you know that I am perfectly fine putting my life in the hands of a female pilot.
Hi folks, this is your captain.
Our flight time to Turks and Caicos is six hours twenty four minutes.
Flight attendants, prepare for takeoff.
All right, time to take our flying medicine Ronaldo gave us.
What does quidado mean? I think it means sleep tight. Oh well, cheers.
What happened? Did we land? Yeah, that stuff is good.
Bad news folks. We have had some mechanical issues and we will need to head back to the gate.
Anytime you head back to the gate, that means your flight's not taking off.
All right, gather your things. We're going to need to scramble to find another one.
Okay, there is a connecting flight through Dallas that leaves in five minutes. You can catch it if you hurry.
I don't want to go to Dallas. We're going to Turks and Caicos.
Dallas is just where you make your connection.
Sorry, I'm having a really hard time processing information right now. We took sleeping pills.
Just make your way over to gate thirty two.
I'm sorry, there's been a horrible mistake. We don't want to go to Dallas.
Okay, listen carefully. You're connecting in Dallas to Turks and Caicos.
You need to be at gate thirty two in four minutes. Do you understand?
Yes, I'm not an idiot.
No, gate thirty two. Write it down.
Why is she so angry? Isn't that obvious? She's totally into me. She gave me a marker.
